about_the_game:
The Go Go Fight is a very simple-to-play multiplayer VR Game. Dodge obstacles, Trigger props, bump into others, and rush to the finish line to scoring points.

All you need to do is take your hands tapping the floor to move forward and jump, And the base VR grip trigger and climb -- that`s it!

By the way, you can use your eyes to have interaction witch UI. (Dont worry about if the eye tracking need in HMD, I had Already CREATE the Eye Tracking for you, ahahhh, just look at and use Trigger to confirm!)

The Game currently has 20 levels and 11 props for randomly spawn, You can make full use of the levels and items to enjoy your party process. Winning or losing is not important, happiness is the most important!

The game features voice chat and open mic as default, so let's communicate kindly and avoid any unpleasantries. Harmony brings prosperity!

Lastly, GoGoFight is independently developed Game. Feel free to provide feedback on any aspect of the game, and I'll update it as soon as possible!
detailed_description:
The Go Go Fight is a very simple-to-play multiplayer VR Game. Dodge obstacles, Trigger props, bump into others, and rush to the finish line to scoring points.

All you need to do is take your hands tapping the floor to move forward and jump, And the base VR grip trigger and climb -- that`s it!

By the way, you can use your eyes to have interaction witch UI. (Dont worry about if the eye tracking need in HMD, I had Already CREATE the Eye Tracking for you, ahahhh, just look at and use Trigger to confirm!)

The Game currently has 20 levels and 11 props for randomly spawn, You can make full use of the levels and items to enjoy your party process. Winning or losing is not important, happiness is the most important!

The game features voice chat and open mic as default, so let's communicate kindly and avoid any unpleasantries. Harmony brings prosperity!

Lastly, GoGoFight is independently developed Game. Feel free to provide feedback on any aspect of the game, and I'll update it as soon as possible!
name: Go Go Fight

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 & 11
  • Processor: Interl i7 or equivalent performance above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 equivalent performance or above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: Ensure the internet to connect the voice chat channel. You must use the VR HMD and get the PC stream link like link the steam vr to join the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 & 11
  • Processor: Interl i7 or equivalent performance above
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 4060 equivalent performance or above
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR
  • Additional Notes: Ensure the internet to connect the voice chat channel. You must use the VR HMD and get the PC stream link like link the steam vr to join the game.

short_description: Very simple to enjoy the happy multiplayer VR Game. Tapping hands to move, jump and grip to climb and hold, no more things to learn. Dodge obstacles, bump into others, and rush to the finish line to scoring points.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean
